Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed Laramie
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing Laramie due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing Laramie due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Diversey/Racine
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Racine, Wellington, Sheffield and Diversey due to street blockage near Diversey/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Racine, Wellington, Sheffield and Diversey due to street blockage near Diversey/Racine.

Allow extra travel time.
